website_summaries.verdict: This is the older Apple Watch with a smaller face, but similar features otherwise. Great entry-level pick.
pros: The most affordable version of the Apple Watch that can still be purchased new
Half the price or less than newer models especially now, and users new to Apple Watch won't miss the minor upgrades in newer versions
cons: Thicker case and smaller screen than newer versions of the Apple Watch

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Fitbit person. But I decided to slurge a little bit...... The only think that kept me from switching was that I had to charge the watch so much more. I originally had the Fitbit charge 2...... then I purchased the series 3 (42mm) and I love this watch but it was just far too big. So I am returning the 42mm and just received the 38mm and am much happier with the size. I wanted to really share the size difference. I love this watch so far... will review in the future.
customer_reviews.author: abillings

customer_reviews.title: A huge and worthwhile upgrade to a series 1
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I upgraded from a series 1. It runs so smooth and flawlessly compared to series 1. It feels like what the Apple Watch was meant to be. The ability for Siri to talk back is refreshing. The ability to see HTML emails is a huge plus as well. And finally the fact that it is waterproof seals the deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who wear watches and are okay with daily charging
customer_reviews.text: I like the Apple Watch Series 3. After trying it out for a few days I realized a few things: I don't wear watches often enough to justify the cost; You'll likely need to charge it daily; It's great for those who already wear watches everyday and can remember to charge it at night; You'll still use your iPhone to handle most tasks. If you want something only for fitness and/or sleep tracking buy a FitBit.
customer_reviews.author: Assorted Gear

customer_reviews.title: WoW!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off... I don’t write reviews, but WOW! was I impressed with this product. This series 3 watch 42mm GPS came brand new. The box was still seal and the protective plastic on the watch was still on the watch. I bought this for my nephew for his Birthday and was worry that when he opened the box their was going to be things missing I took a risk and I’m glad I did. Thanks to this seller and would definitely buy again. HAPPY HOLIDAYS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Thought the 42mm was going to be too big with my small wrist. It ended up looking great and got here earlier than expected
customer_reviews.author: Mireya Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Prime with the win
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch this morning and it arrived 6 hours later. It’s brand new still in the official Apple box sealed and came with an extra band(S/M) and the magnetic USB. I must say I am thrilled with the watch, the speed of delivery, and overall awesomeness of Prime!
customer_reviews.author: Legion Sauce

customer_reviews.title: Brand new watch for 50$ lower than retail
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda skeptical at first that this would be a refurbished watch or opened one but when It got delivered it was brand new with all the wrapping around it. The only thing that might be a problem for some would be that it did not come with a charging “brick” for the wall. No problem for me though since ive accumulated a ton. Battery life has lasted 3 days on a full charge so far and Ive used it in workouts and tracks steps gps data and heartrate very well. Havent tried the waterproof feature but I dont plan on wearing it near water anyway since apple doesnt cover water damage in any warranty
customer_reviews.author: Fernandman

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: After wasting most of a day with apple tech support, I had to accept the fact that this apple watch was defective. Decided to pay a little more and order directly ftom apple. I had such a difficult time understanding the Amazon representative! Finally, i think, my return authorization was taken care of. Who knows, Indian language reps?
customer_reviews.author: Blueman

customer_reviews.title: Paid $283 For An Apple Box Without The Watch
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t Even Recieve An Apple Watch In The Box. Just The Apple Box With The Charger & The Small/Medium Band.
customer_reviews.author: Arvell White

customer_reviews.title: Everything is important!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bit of kit, highly recommend purchasing it. You can monitor calls, txt and emails just by looking at your watch, tell Siri to txt/call someone while driving and people don’t even realize you’re talking through your watch while keeping your hands on the steering wheel!!! Can’t tell you how pleased I am!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam H.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy from Amamzon; sending defective returns as "new"
customer_reviews.text: Bought Tuesday, has not worked properly once, lots of trouble shooting. Knew when I received my "new" item that it was obviously a return. That is how the world works, I guess, but it was also defective, and that isn't how the world works. Stop doing shady stuff like this, it gives your companies a bad name. Wish I could return it, but I lost part of the band, so I am stuck with a nothing more than a kids toy.
customer_reviews.author: reeraaroo

customer_reviews.title: Stuck in loading :(
customer_reviews.text: The watch was in a constant state of pooping the Apple logo and did not break out of it even with a reset.
customer_reviews.author: Lunar Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would've stayed with Fitbit
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be my biggest disappointment with Apple. I have two iPads, a MacBook Pro, been using iPhones for over 6 years. So it's not that I hate Apple, but this ... was a complete disappointment. Glass screen is uber fragile, battery life is horrible, and the fitness components SO LIMITED! It's good with notifications and being able to respond, but my cellphone is always with me. So I feel this was just a useless investment as it does not track my sleep natively nor is its fitness app anywhere close to Fitbit's. Glad I didn't pay the premium "new released product" price, but I'd much rather have had a Fitbit Versa - even with their limited notifications.
customer_reviews.author: A. Roldan

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think it’s new
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be running great. They described it as new.. but it has a year + of someone’s workout on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apple Watch always Excited
customer_reviews.text: First Apple Watch for my spouse as a Wedding Gift. She is excited and speechless... Will go with additional strap to add a sporty look.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: i never thought i would get an apple watch, but wanting to add some tracking/encouragement to working out, i went for it. i also swim, so that was a big seller for me. i am SO happy with this watch. simple to use and works great. charge always last me at least a full day, if not 2. i got a Velcro strap for it, but the one it comes with is fine and comfortable. the tracking is accurate, and the swimming tracking is insane. it tracks each specific strokes (free, back, ect) distance you go for the workout which i am so happy with. love the product and highly recommend. for being a generation behind, it is still incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this watch as an anniversary present. I tried to pair the device to my iPhone for days... I reached out to Apple support online and they can not figure out the problem. I have a meeting with an Apple technician in person and if they still cannot figure out why THIS BRAND NEW WATCH will not pair... I am returning and better receive a new product that ACTUALLY works. I have been wanting an Apple Watch for years... my husband and I are so disappointment that this gift has been such a headache!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing X-Mas Gift at an Amazing Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome gift at 225$ and prime shipped on black friday, in sealed box, with full 1 year warranty by apple. i'm very glad with my order. this is the Series 3 and has several updates from my previous series 1, love the waterproof design for this! it keeps me up to date with my notifications and more, without needed to take my phone out of my pocket every time it rings!
customer_reviews.author: XtremeFX

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch on Black Friday and got THE BEST DEAL! No other store or website had the watch priced lower! It was brand new and I was still able to add Apple Care+ after my purchase! Love this watch! I didn’t want to pay a monthly service fee for it because really, I’m always going to have my phone on me. I’m still able to use it to make phone calls, text, check email, get my social media updates and lots more! When I’m at home or at the office, I can still move between rooms (without my phone) without Losing service! So glad I didn’t waste money on buying a watch with a cellular plan!
customer_reviews.author: S. Turner

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this product 6 Stars I would
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews on products... ever!! but this is the most satisfied I've even been with a product that I've purchased online. I order the 38mm white Apple watch and it was so perfect, even came sealed in a brand new apple watch box. It came with two different sets of wrist bands as well as a charger. Definitely worth the money. Would recommend to anyone skeptical.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Woods

customer_reviews.title: Watch is awsome
customer_reviews.text: So when I ordered this I order the white band and silver case but I got the black and gray one.... other then that this watch is amazing!! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: ariel

customer_reviews.title: Slow and overpriced even at new low prices
customer_reviews.text: I am very underwhelmed with my first Apple Watch. Coming from a Fitbit Alta HR, my first impressions are that the battery life is much worse, it doesn't track your sleep and doesn't have alarms (that I've been able to find) to wake you up. It also requires daily charging and the only charging cable is too cumbersome to carry around. While I will be keeping it because the find my iPhone button comes in handy and the reminders to practice deep breathing are nice, I wish I had held out for a newer version of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: MC.S

customer_reviews.title: It arrived earlier than what was first promised.
customer_reviews.text: It connected and started up right away. No issues. love the look and feel. I didn't realize they send an extra band that is a bigger size. That was nice because I need the larger size band so I changed to it.
customer_reviews.author: April P.

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing, Just buy from Apple!!
customer_reviews.text: As tempting as it may be to save a little money, just buy the watch from apple. I ended up paying $200 for a watch band and no watch. While amazon has accepted a return, it has not been as smooth a process as it should be, and the last amazon representative I interacted with was incredibly rude! Save yourself the headache, read the negative reviews before purchasing, I am not the first person this happened to and a number of other people received defective items!! I ended up purchasing the same watch from apple, paid a little more, but at least I got the watch and it works!!!
customer_reviews.author: camille

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but FRAGILE! (And too expensive to fix)
customer_reviews.text: Great watch but sadly not very durable. All the features are up to par with Apple products but the screen is extremely susceptible to cracking even with the slightest bump. Had it for a month before a small bump against a wall created a crack across the face horizontally; the touch screen does not function at all now. Apple repair is $289, which is more than the cost of the watch! Highly recommend getting a protective case for this due to the poor screen durability.
customer_reviews.author: Raz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly as described! Brand new and box was sealed! Best price! It’s replacing my Fitbit Versa. There is no comparison even though Fitbit has been wonderful to me. Nothing beats Apples display, size, functionality, etc.
customer_reviews.author: tlorn

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Battery Life is not the best. Last me around 12-16 hours per day. Besides that everything works great!
customer_reviews.author: Andre Suero

customer_reviews.title: The watch is perfect
customer_reviews.text: The watch is perfect. It came two days later ALTHOUGH I paid for next day shipping!! I’m also missing the adapter that was suppose to be included.
customer_reviews.author: Fam5

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment this watch is. I spent over 5 hours trying to get this watch setup and paired with my phone and all I got was a “pairing failed” message even after trying every suggested fix. I spent over 2 hours on the phone with tech support and they couldn’t figure out the problem. Now I have to wait to go to the Apple store (which is nowhere near me) and have them try to solve the problem. I should have just gone and purchased a watch from the store in the first place instead of on here. Terrible quality control! Apple/Amazon can’t even sell a working Apple Watch. What a joke and waste of my time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I took advantage of prime day and bought the Apple Watch for $200. I thought I would love it but it didn’t grow on me at all. Prior to having an Apple watch I had a Fitbit and liked the simplicity of it. The Apple Watch had a variety of apps on it but a lot of them I never used on my iPhone so never used them on the Apple Watch. The most disappointing thing about the Apple Watch is the battery life. Every day I had to charge it which was extremely inconvenient. I ended up selling the watch and switching back to Fitbit.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy54321

customer_reviews.title: So far...love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got the smallest size in the series 3. Very happy. All the apps I want to use on my watch are available. Pandora, My Net Diary, Pokemon, Heart rate app. Love the walkie talkie feature. Thinking of getting the larger one for my husband for fathers day. I chose not to get the cellular service because I really don't mind having my phone with me, but I love not having to take my phone out when I am on a run. I only wish the charge lasted longer that a day. Previously had a fit bit, 4-5 day charge, but I could not see the face when it was sunny out. Definitely sticking with apple.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy F.

customer_reviews.title: Series 3 became more affordable
customer_reviews.text: Once the series 4 came out, and with the holiday deals, I’m happy to have received the new pricing and opportunity to get the series 3 watch. I’ve never really liked any type of digital watch, since analog hands were just more desirable to me. . This gadget is more useful than any watch ever. Finally, tech to be happy to wear, and swapping the face is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE FROM AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: I am ready to get rid of this watch. I’m having many problems with this Apple Watch. Recommend purchasing from Apple store direction and not amazon. The warranty and return period passed and immediately after it started glitching. Amazon said they could do nothing about it and provided zero support. DO NOT PURCHASE FROM AMAZON. Took it to Apple store for support and it was fixed for a day, now I am having same error. Apple warranty and return period is much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Y.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited to buy this item. Worked great for about two weeks, then started malfunctioning. The touch screen stopped working, was not able to click on any apps. The screen would turn off a second after turning on. Very frustrating. I took it to the Apple store, the employee said he had not seen a watch malfunction like that before. Luckily Amazon accepted my return, which I am appreciative of - however, I hope they do not resell this watch as "new" to another customer.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one for a while and purchased it right before it went on sale (boo hoo) but I am enjoying it every much. I bought it for the health and activity features but love the fact I can read and respond to a text message on it, get weather updates and control my music. I wanted the newer one with the blood pressure monitoring but that will have to wait for now. Great entry level Apple Watch. If you're on the fence about spending the money on a watch, go ahead and try this one out. I think you will be very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Camille

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Apple watches come defective, got a 2nd one as a replacement and issue still is happening. I called Apple tech support and they weren’t able to figure out the issue and suggest to just get a replacement again. Very disappointed that after all the trouble shooting we still couldn’t make it work.
customer_reviews.author: sergio

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this !! I cannot tell you how much time I wasted trying to get this to pair up with my iphoneX. What should have taken a few minutes to set up ended up being hrs of frustration, getting Apple support, then having to run the watch all the way to an Apple store only to be told it needed to be sent out to have the software updated! It wasn’t able to connect to any iPhone at all. Apple said that’s what happens when you buy from Amazon? Just an epic 3 days of total frustration and wasted time. I wish I had never bought the watch!!!! 0 stars on this. I’m really disappointed with Amazon
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Heart rate tracker helped alert me! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love the fitness and heart rate tracker on my watch. Able to track exercise throughout the day and steps at work. I had a crazy health issue the other day and my heart rate was all over the place. My watch gave me an alert that my heart rate had a huge jump of 30 points. I actually ended up being quite sick and ended up being hospitalized the next day with tachycardia symptoms due to septic shock. My watch in fact picked this up when it started happening.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Eeehhhh!!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the Fitbit versa 2 this is a bust! Pros: 1. Changeable bands(very cute options) 2. Changeable watch faces Cons: 1. Battery life( last half a day and I don’t use it for a phone or music just a watch) 2. Very bulky and I bump into everything when I’m wearing it(my clumsy fault) 3. Takes forever to charge (runs out of battery in no time) 4.disconnects from the app by itself! 5.takes forever to turn it back on after it’s been sitting on the logo screen for 10-15 minute usually! I wouldn’t buy it unless you buy the newer one might be faster and work better!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review of the apple watch series 3
customer_reviews.text: I like color and the modern style of the watch, it fits great, and it is very comfortable. Only dislike is how breakable it is, when you drop it it will scratch pretty easily, maybe if your looking for a apple watch hat will not scratch as easily get a 5 or a 6. The four might work I have not done to much research but i know that the five and the six are great if you want it to not get scratched as easily. Over all a great product, but I would not recommend if you plan on wearing it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon CS Is the worst
customer_reviews.text: What a nightmare. Purchased for new fitness challenge and it came already attached to an Apple ID. Got the run around from amazon for 40 minutes and treated like garbage. Finally told them to pay the difference for the new one or unsubscribe me from prime and I’d go to Best Buy. They agreed to pay the difference for the new watch. Idk who failed at amazon, checking on Apple IDs but they need fired. Started my challenge with no tracker, days behind others now.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Tiny wrist friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I have super tiny wrists and this fit better than the ones I tried on in store! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: People say you don’t know why everyone loves their Apple Watch til you have one and boy are they right! I tried several other smart watches that had lots of problems before trying Apple. Wish I had just gotten one of these in the first place. Watch came new, sealed in the box. Works perfectly with no problems at all. I use my watch constantly all day at work and only charge it every other night! Other watches I tried barely made it to the end of 1 day. Love this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Shantell Panger

customer_reviews.title: Won’t connect issue fixed
customer_reviews.text: Well after an hour of trying to get it to connect to my phone and failed time after time I called apple support and 3 hours later I find out the watch won’t update due to the watch having such an old version on software. Update they have pushed a software patch though love the product I just wish it would have worked right away when I took it out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Larson

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I’d own one but I love it
customer_reviews.text: My job doesn’t allow cell phones at work, that being said I can read and respond to texts very quickly and no one knows. It also sends me alerts about my fitness, I found it annoying and furnished but it surprisingly motivates me to put in that extra 10 minutes to meet my fitness goal
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Actually like this watch
customer_reviews.text: Interesting watch. Not as much detail as the fitbit but it does have a customizable screen so you can see what you want on the screen instead of having to only use the phone. Like the fact that I can answer calls with the watch, which is good when I happen to step away from the phone while it's charging and can still see the call. Just wish the battery life could be longer, but given what it does and how much it can be customized withe the different complications, I can see why it's a short charge hold.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Best steal ever !
customer_reviews.text: Man I remember when these were $529 , this is an amazing deal it works amazingly and watched many yt videos that recommended this one instead of the upgrade, very easy set up. Make sure to update your phone to speed up process (: Mine is the 38 mm in Space gray aluminum, although I ordered a pink sand band for $5 separately! Also and extra band comes inside in case the size you git ended up not fitting as well as a charger without cube !
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: The real. I love this watch. The battery is t the greatest. You’re not going to be able to sleep track unless you charge it before sleeping. I typically charge my watch every evening to have enough charge for the next day. I opted to not get a cellular version because who really doesn’t have their phone near them most of the time? I have always said I’d never buy it but it was worth every penny! It also comes with two bands so I wouldn’t worry about sizing. You can also compete with your friends in fitness games.
customer_reviews.author: PDX Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Update: the charge lasts around 48 hours with normal use. Wear the watch every day since I bought it and it works and looks just as good as the day I got it. Love my watch. This is the first Apple Watch that I have owned and I absolutely love it. I ordered the 42mm watch. I have small wrists and was worried it would look to large but it looks great. I wear it every day and put it on the charger before I go to bed. I believe the charge would last at least 24 hours. Since I don’t track my sleep I Charge it while I charge my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most confusing apple product ive ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch so i could track my miles, listen to audible books snd podcasts and so far i havent figured out how to do any of that. This is the most un-user friendly apple product ive ever purchased. It comes with zero instructions so im googling you tube, tech support calls to audible and apple and im still extremely frustrated. All i want is to easily transfer info from my phone watch spp to the watch. Errors, trying this and that mostly unsuccessfully. If i cant download audible books im sending it back. Steve Jobs is missed!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Ranck

customer_reviews.title: Love my Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: I’d put off buying an Apple Watch because of the price but after having gone through several other trackers, I decided to gift myself with the one I really wanted and I’m so glad I did!! Changing watch faces is simple (I’m currently in love with the Minnie Mouse face because when I tap it she announces the time and if it’s the 1st time that morning she follows the time with “good morning!” which makes me smile). The activity tracking is good and I enjoy the reminders to stand up and to breathe. Great purchase no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to have it inspected by a Apple representative
customer_reviews.text: The watch was brand new and I had to call Apple support regarding battery . It would be drained after 8 hours of wear and not even playing music or using fitness tracking or anything. Then 3 days later had issues with the touch screen on the watch.. wojsknr let me touch any app to open it kept taking me to passcode and then it wouldn’t let me put in passcode
customer_reviews.author: Flowers Allen

customer_reviews.title: Apple Watch stopped working!!
customer_reviews.text: I need an upgrade/replacement ASAP. This Apple Watch is less than a year old and has stopped working!! I am ticked off because I can no longer compete for steps with friends or even track my steps. This is the second Apple Watched purchased from Amazon, the first one had no issues yet this one has stopped working completely. I hate this situation!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: New new
customer_reviews.text: This is brand new straight from the apple store. I love it so much
customer_reviews.author: Asma

customer_reviews.title: Great! Until it breaks.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Series 3 in July of 2019, as an upgrade from my Series 1. I love my Apple Watch. I used to roll my eyes when they first came out, how unnecessary was this? When I was gifted a Series 1, I was quickly hooked. Unfortunately, less than one year after purchasing the 3, the glass around the screen broke while I was putting on a sweatshirt. A quick internet search shows that it’s fairly common with this model. I bit the bullet and bought the 5 as a replacement. Hopefully the issue does not repeat with a newer model.
customer_reviews.author: k.heem

customer_reviews.title: Money well-spent!
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as ordered. This one is an upgrade from my gen 1 series watch, but I didn’t feel like shelling out close to ~$800+ for the new gen 4. The battery life isn’t as bad as I’ve read in previous reviews. At the end of the day, I’ve had from 50-60 percent battery life, and that’s with moderate to heavy usage. You still have to charge it every night, but I personally don’t consider that much of an issue. I’ve already persuaded my sister into buying one and will definitely continue recommending to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Letsgetdangerous_

customer_reviews.title: USP adaptor
customer_reviews.text: I just received my watch and I'm happy with it. I see the website says it includes a power adapter however it seems that Apple perhaps stopped including them? The box is too flat for one to fit. That being said, I called Amazon and an agent agreed to send me one at no charge. Amazon sells them for $15 so if you don't receive it, give them a call. I suggested that they change the listing if in fact none of them include adapters. The price is great (even without the adapter). This is an upgrade from a Series 1 and it seems faster and the screen is brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Easy Connection with IPhone
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy and quick it was to connect to my phone and that I can reply to text messages. There are "canned" messages and you can use the microphone to voice to text, you can also use your finger to draw the letters and it will recognize them. I didn't like that the instructions were printed in a VERY light grey on white paper???? Why didn't they just print black on the white? I ended up googling the instructions just so I could read them with ease. I wish it had sleep monitoring and EKG, but not willing to pay the difference yet to have that feature (it is on Apple 5 series)
customer_reviews.author: Tracie M. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: This crap won’t even pair with my 6sPlus although it says it’s compatible. I should have known better than to buy anything from Apple ever again. It keeps unpairing as soon as I pair it and it says my software on the phone is out dated. I just did a fricking update to the latest apple software on my phone which is 12.4. This pisses me off because the watch won’t pair after all the trouble shooting videos on YouTube and from the Apple support team. I want my damn money back and you can keep this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Not as fitness focused as I was wanting
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. Still trying to figure out the fitness specs. Not as fitness savvy as my old Fitbit as I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Recsolstice589

customer_reviews.title: Did not pair with iphone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use with my iPhone 7 and I had to send it back because it did not pair. I was on the phone with customer service with apple and did all the trouble shooting (had the latest update, restarted phone and watch, reset phone settings and restored watch to default) with no luck. I tried on my wife's phone which works with her watch and didnt pair. Super disapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Miller

customer_reviews.title: 2 weeks and Malfunctioning...
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch. It helps me be on my phone less and has gotten me to be a bit more active. It's a great quality of life gadget. Unfortunately, the screen started to malfunction after 3 weeks of light use! When I look at the watch, it looks as if someone is rapidly swiping up and down and attempting to press all the buttons rapidly. The thing goes completely haywire and I am forced to restart it for a temporary fix. Amazon is sending me a replacement so I'm really hoping this one was a bad seed.
customer_reviews.author: Noble Z

customer_reviews.title: Modern and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale and was very happy about it. Screen was bright and sharp. Connects well with my Iphone 6S plus. I hope it will last at least 2 years or more before upgrading.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shuenn

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my series 3 especially for the price. It does more than what I need so I couldn’t justify paying much more for the series 4. I haven’t had it long but love it so far. As most apple products, pretty user friendly and easy to figure out all the different options. The rubber band that it comes with works fine, but does get sweaty underneath while being active so I ordered a new band that I’m excited to try and see how it works. Love the fact you can customize the watch so easily with bands. For sure more “techy” than my fitbits I have had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: CJSchoser

customer_reviews.title: It is fast and battery is okay
customer_reviews.text: I had the 1st generation Apple Watch and it felt SUPER slow! So decided to buy the 3rd generation and I am glad I did, it is FAR FAR more reliable and quick to perform what you ask it to do. The battery if used normally it lasts me 3 days. Absolutely best watch ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jose C.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage strapped to your wrist
customer_reviews.text: This is a disappointment to Apple. Piece of garbage strapped to your wrist. Takes twelve years to turn on, dies constantly even if you charge it, doesn’t transfer calories/workouts to your phone. Everything it says it’s going to do, if fails to do. Probably going to run it over with my car later.
customer_reviews.author: kaley

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: The Apple Watch is the best smart watch you can buy. I love that it tracks your heart rate, sleeping, steps, etc. The watch itself came packaged as expected and works like it should. If you're looking for a great watch, but reasonably priced, the series 3 is your go to. It is not the newest one out, but still functions perfectly and there aren't many changes between 3 and 5 (newest).
customer_reviews.author: Brittinee A.

customer_reviews.title: I. LOVE. THIS. WATCH.
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to purchase an Apple Watch???? This beats fit bit hands down, so many cool features. Most importantly, you can actually see the clock face when you are outside!!! That used to bug the crap out of me. what good is a watch that I couldn't read half the time. I love that I can wear it in the pool, answer my phone in the pool, and control music while in the pool. Its a cool looking watch too, and the band is real comfortable material. It doesn't come undone either. I am so glad I finally bought an Apple Watch. I am done with Fitbit.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Pair With My Phone
customer_reviews.text: Really was looking forward to the watch but when it got here it wasn’t able to pair I tried for hours going through every tutorial and calling apple... NOTHING WORKED. I am disappointed in amazon. If you want an Apple Watch just get it from the Apple store itself. There is no problem with my phone...
customer_reviews.author: Austin H

customer_reviews.title: Wish battery life was longer
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this product: I like the user interface and being able to seamlessly connect it to my iPhone. Paying with my Apple watch (especially during the pandemic) is a huge plus since I don't have to touch my phone out in public! What I *really* dislike: The battery life to this thing is abhorrent. Many people charge their Apple watches over night, but I like keep it on to see my sleep cycle. This gives me short amounts of time to charge it during the day (during breakfast, after work for a bit). I hope the next model significantly improves in this area, but until then--this will have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Used or refurbished don’t buy from amazon
customer_reviews.text: Last year I bought the same watch from Apple store and it was awesome but anyway I gave that watch to my brother and again bought the same watch from amazon. What I can feel that something is not right, especially battery how can battery be drained in few hours when I’m not even using it . I think it was used or refurbished. My advice is not to buy apple products from amazon, it was 20$ cheap in comparison to apple store but don’t fall for that trap as they are used or have some technical problems.
customer_reviews.author: Farhan Mirza

customer_reviews.title: Yes, the Series 3 is still worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Researched and contemplated whether to get the series 3 or 4. I wasn’t looking for a smart watch but the reduced price of the series 3 intrigued me. I’ve had it for 1 week and I love it and all of the features. I had a cheap fitness tracker before and didn’t wear it everyday but liked having a basic tracker. I can already see that I’ll be wearing my Apple smart watch everyday. My wife has the series 4 and she loves it as well, but the series 3 is perfect for me at less than $200 and the same software that’s running in the latest model.
customer_reviews.author: KevinS

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been one to get too excited over technology, but this watch is amazing! Since I live in MN and the laws are changing August 1st regarding cell phones and driving, I'm very happy to have a way to answer phone calls and be in compliance. Very easy to set up and sync music; love the different features like the heart rate monitor and fitness tracker. Only downside is the limited battery life - I haven't lost a charge yet, but making sure I plug in every night can be a hassle as I'm a forgetful person. Overall, great product, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek design and great product all together
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his Apple Watch and wears it every day. Battery life for the both of us is about 2 days before we have to sit it on the charger. We don’t shower with ours on but it seems to hold up great when washing our hands and things like that. I’m sure it would be fine in the shower but it’s juer a personal performance not to for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Randazzo

customer_reviews.title: Great Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s great! Love all the features the Apple Watch comes with especially the message speech to text!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Steven Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Buy a band on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love my watch. I charge it each night and don’t use it for sleep monitoring but days I forgotten to charge it, the battery will last into at least lunch the next day and I’ll just charge it at work during my lunch break. It’s great for getting text because I supervise a team and if I’m in a meeting elsewhere in the building I can see they text me and make sure it’s not an emergency without constantly checking my phone. My son plays with the toy story face and it’s nice to get those notifications when you reach your steps
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Loh

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Waited, Glad I Purshased!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I waited for the Series 3. I pretty much own most Apple Products. From the Original 2007 iPhone, to the AirPad, to the MacBook Pro and right up to the iPhone 11. But, I never seemed interested in the Apple Watch. I didn't think it did much at its first Launch. But now with the latest Watch OS 6.1.1, this Series 3 is Fantastic! i love responding to texts, even rejecting call right from my wrist. I love the simple controls as well, when listening to iHeartRadio, Pandora or any Streaming service from my iPhone. At this price, it's the Perfect Choice! I do recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fingerz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the expense
customer_reviews.text: I kept debating buying one of these bad boys, that is until there was a sudden price drop and a credit that amazon thought would be great to give me, so I jumped on the deal. I’ve never been huge on wearing watches, but the watch was super comfortable and not anywhere near as obnoxious as any other watch I’ve owned. The battery lasts almost 3 days for me, and just about 2 for my wife, even with constant use. I can use way more features of my phone from my watch than I expected and there are even some fun features that I didn’t know about like the walk-in talkie. Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer #645

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Got the 42mm black Apple Watch for 229. Best Buy and Apple had it for around 279-300, so I’m glad I went to amazon! Got it on time, came in the original Apple packaging, brand new. I’m so happy with the watch itself but also satisfied with the price I got it for.
customer_reviews.author: steph. S

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my watch!!! It was between an apple watch series 3 and a fitbit charge 3. I went back and forth between the two for awhile after much researching, and decided on the apple watch. I am thrilled with my decision. With the price being $199 and the fitbit charge 3 being $149. I felt that I liked more of the apple features and look. I walked through best buy playing with both and the apple watch was more of what I wanted. I have only positive things to say!
customer_reviews.author: kdavis1106

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift for my wife.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife's birthday, she loved it. Works great out of the box. easy pairing with IOS. (Look up how to get the exact notifications you want to show on the watch) after a bit of tinkering it's great, many features you aren't looking but turn up being helpful. Some of the features my wife really likes: - Siri on your wrist. - Only the notifications you want, good for meetings. - Hands free calls, good for quick calls. - Speech recognition for replying messages quickly without getting the phone out. - Gps for running workouts. - Spotify quick controls. - Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: not good for tracking steps
customer_reviews.text: I miss my FitBit Charge which worked so much better for a podometer. Any arm movement with this watch will track as steps so when I am knitting, I can go well over 10K steps. This then gives a bogus reading on the calories burned. I got this instead of replacing my fitbit charge because of the extra features, however, for what I was using, I miss the step tracker on the fitbit. It is convenient, however, to answer my watch instead of looking for my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected and good value
customer_reviews.text: After years of using a Fitbit that easily gave me 5 days between charges, my greatest hesitation was battery life, but this watch has been great and the battery has delivered much better than expected. Love the connectivity to my iPhone and appreciate the full integration. Considering the price difference between this and the newest models, it's well worth it. I'm very happy with this purchase and can't imagine preferring the available alternatives at this point.
customer_reviews.author: CDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service. TERRIBLE professionalism
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give it 0 stars. I had high hopes with this product as i ordered an iPhone through amazon and it works fine and had zero issues. When going through the setup it said it was locked with the previous owners information and when I contacted amazon support they contacted Apple and they informed me that they can’t do anything with the product and I would have to contact the previous owner. Now that I can’t do anything and I have to return it there are no watches any where near the price this one was. Completely disappointed with this as it should have been caught before the product was shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard whittney

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a month
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my watch was perfect until it wasn’t. A little over a month after I bought it, it won’t charge or turn on. It just has the green charge symbol with the chord on the screen. I’ve read that this means it’s just DONE. I used my watch all day, every day. So, I must say I’m pretty bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited about getting an Apple Watch. Sadly it’s a bust. Doesn’t pair to my iPhone 8 Plus. Will have to waste my time and go to a store to see if they can do anything about it. If not I will be returning for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Had it sent out to Apple for diagnostic
customer_reviews.text: Reason for the two stars. My 2 hour wait with Apple, and 2 hours of them having me trying to connect my IPhone XR to my Apple Watch. From what Apple told the watch is not loaded with the latest software, so if you have the newest version on your phone your unlikely able to connect yours as well. I have not received my watch back yet, or a answer on why it keep failing. Shipping was quick though so that was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kruszka

customer_reviews.title: From Fitbit charge dos to Apple Watch series trey.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to leave the Fitbit family after 2 and a half years. Right off the bat, I see that the battery life and the lack of sleep tracking make this product fall slightly behind the Fitbit product when it comes to fitness and health. Entertainment wise, the Apple Watch is years ahead of Fitbit and the fact that it syncs with my iphone makes it so easy to use. It’s convenient and it also Makes me feel like a basic b****. Give you all another update in three months.
customer_reviews.author: Stoner Man 420

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Life. Smarter than it appears.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch but became bored of it after a while. However, the notifications and ability to respond is great and I use the watch almost daily. The phone app is also very user friendly and very useful. After having owned it for a while, this watch never fails to surprise me with the functions it has, such as detecting and tracking exercise, or being able to be used to control music on Bluetooth earphones. EASILY worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch you didn’t know you needed till you get it.
customer_reviews.text: I love my iWatch, like most people, I didn’t know what I was missing until I had one and now I don’t get up without putting it on for the day. It’s been super handy as it vibrates and rings when people call or text and so I don’t miss near as many calls. I like the activity app! Witch integrates data from the iWatch Strava app without problem. I love the Strava app for my cycling cpu and it works awesome on the iWatch. I get my heart rate, distance, mph, average mph, time, elevation gain, Ect. From my iWatch. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vette racer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! Doesn't work and can't return have to "repair"
customer_reviews.text: I received this product on 7/1. Haven't been able to use it yet because the screen goes black every time I select an app. I've spent hours on the phone with support to try and resolve the issue. Called Amazon support they didn't help, they sent me to Apple. Called Apple support they are asking me to send it in for "repair". Brand new product that doesn't work and no one will exchange it for another. I am extremely disappointed in the customer service from both organizations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SuperWatch!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present for my wife who has always wanted one but was unsure if the cost was justified. I decided to start her off with the Series 3 watch. She loves it. She can quickly respond to texts without needing her phone nearby and she can answers calls through the watch as well. Also one of her favorite things is how easily she can change watchbands to fit her changing style or seasons. This is a great buy and will definitely recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs, better then I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch, easy to set up but it takes a little why to pair it with your device (~10 minutes). Very stylish. I had to order a separate band because my wrist is quite big and the original one wouldn’t even reach around, but it’s not their fault because an 8” wrist isn’t very common Many designs of faces to pick from, although I hate every other design except modular.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Bowes

customer_reviews.title: Great Delivery And  Best Smart Watch
customer_reviews.text: Well I am using this watch from last one year and want to say that its simply Awesome !! This was my first watch which I purchased a year before but based on its performance and features it encourage to give this review. This apple smart watch and apps are good,Looks classic though bought 3 strips from amazon :). The only thing I dont like is the price of this product ,Lol obvious its apple and cant expect price lower than this. Over all I am happy to have this watch and it keeps track of all my health . I like the Amazon expediency and range of products—- makes my shopping for gifts so easy and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: It’s legit
customer_reviews.text: This is my third or fourth apple watch. I keep breaking them but they are addictive. I broke my last one and didn’t get extended coverage bc the way they break is covered by product warranty. However, last time, it wasn’t! Smh it would have cost $250 to get a series 3 replacement. I found this and got the warranty. The way that it break always breaks is, the face detaches from the watch so, I got the face protector this time. It came brand new w/ the charger and extra band. I had to update and sync and it was good to go. I’m pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: TIFFANY

customer_reviews.title: MISSING THE WATCH IN THE BOX
customer_reviews.text: Be cautious about buying the used model from Amazon Warehouse. I received a box with the charging cable, 1/2 wrist strap, AND NO WATCH! I’ve been a Amazon Prime member for nearly 8 years and have never seen anything like this happen before.
customer_reviews.author: man3ster

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the original Apple Watch. This one tracks my exercise so much better. I rated the sleep tracking 1/5 because this watch doesn’t do that... There’s supposed to be one released at the end of 2020 that tracks sleep. But I like this watch for reading texts, tracking exercise, and even answering calls is great quality. Couldn’t go a day without it! I love not having to have my phone on me all the time and this watch makes that possible.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: This has been a real disappointment in so many ways. Battery life is horrible and you have to charge it every day. It lack basic capabilities that other cheaper tracker have like sleep tracking. The automatic tracking of activities works poorly. And the app is not the most intuitive and to find information on the watch is lacking and difficult to find. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Too Small a Face for the Upgraded Band
customer_reviews.text: Returned the watch and got the 42mm model - much better size for my wrist and the upgraded band. Love the watch, does everything I need for a much better price than the newer ones. The watch has a roughly 3.5 day battery life used the way I do. It replaces my fit bit Versa and shows much more of text messages. I think my 3 series fits my usage pattern and got it for less than $200.
customer_reviews.author: brmacp

customer_reviews.title: The Apple Watch is really a great addition to my devices.
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving my watch. Still learning more about it every day. Getting messages, email and everything I need right on my wrist. Love the activity function. It really encourages me to be more active. My favorite thing to do is ask it to set a timer when I cook or wash clothes. The only reason I didn’t give it 4 stars is the band. I bought two more bracelet style bands and replaced that white plastic band. It made my wrist sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Joan109
